DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether BMS-986120 , aspirin , aspirin clopidogrel decrease blood clotting .
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Healthy subject determine clinically significant deviation normal medical history , physical examination , ECGs clinical laboratory determination Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 inclusive . BMI = weight ( kg ) / [ height ( ) ] 2 Females childbearing potential ( i.e. , postmenopausal surgically sterile ) men age 18 65 , inclusive Azoospermic male woman childbearing potential ( i.e . postmenopausal surgically sterile ; see section 3.3.3 definition WOCBP ) exempt contraceptive requirement .
